document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the Antarctic and sub-Antarctic Phoxocephalidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Gammaridea) with taxonomic, distribution and ecological data

Depth range: Shallow littoral- 1031 m .

Type-locality:
H.M.S. Challenger
1873–1876
, Kerguelen Islands, [
49 ° 15 ’S
69 ° 10 ’E
], 54–216 m (TRS 88 ).
Ecology: Collected from mud, sandy mud, sand, gravel, occasionally with bryozoans.

Type material location:
NHM, London.

Remarks: See remarks under
Pseudharpinia dentata
.
Pseudharpinia obtusifrons
presents new records in the Magellan Area and in the Drake Passage (Rauschert, unpubl.).
